last_episode_to_air.name: Will Victoria Say Yes?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Theresa brings Victoria and the whole family on an excursion to pick a wedding dress. Then, Theresa reunites a hearing-impaired client with the loved ones who supported her. Later, Theresa visits a jail to read an inmate separated from her by glass.

name: Long Island Medium
overview: Theresa Caputo is an average mom from Long Island in every way except one: she talks to the dead. Theresa spends her days with her loving family and helping individuals connect to the spirits of their departed loved ones. This is not her job…this is her life.

episodes.name: No Turning Off
episodes.overview: We are introduced to Theresa and her family. She finds it very hard to "turn off" her gift and her daughter bets her she can't make it through a family BBQ without reading all of their guests.

episodes.name: Sailing with Spirits
episodes.overview: Theresa does a group reading for passengers aboard a cruise ship. Later, Theresa's husband has a big surprise for her.

episodes.name: Meeting the Parents
episodes.overview: In the second-season premiere, Victoria hopes that her mother's abilities can take a night off when her boyfriend and his parents come for dinner.

episodes.name: Drumming and Healing
episodes.overview: With her busy schedule weighing on her, Theresa decides to host a drumming circle at the house to 're-ground' herself, and invites her spiritual healer Pat, who helped Theresa realize she was a medium.

episodes.name: The Royal Flush
episodes.overview: When the Caputo's decide to redo their bathroom, Larry becomes overwhelmed with the task; Theresa experiences a spirit that leaves her in shock.

episodes.name: Girls Night In
episodes.overview: Theresa invites her friends over for a girls' night; a man hears an incredible message from his dad.

episodes.name: Bouffants and Bingo
episodes.overview: Theresa amazes her dad at bingo, and helps a local organization with a group reading. Later, three kids hear incredible messages during a reading with Theresa.

episodes.name: The Pincushion
episodes.overview: Theresa takes Larry to acupuncture to help him quit smoking; a woman and her daughter are spooked by noises occurring in their house.

episodes.name: Once Upon A Dream
episodes.overview: After having a dream about her husband cheating on her, Theresa coerces Larry & their son to take dance lessons with her. Also, a woman hears a message from her deceased husband that no one else would know.

episodes.name: The Patient
episodes.overview: Long Island Medium: The Patient Theresa is in total disarray after a mole removed from her foot is being tested for melanoma. Plus, a couple hears from their deceased child in one of Theresa’s most powerful group readings.

episodes.name: Gluten Free V
episodes.overview: Victoria claims she is allergic to gluten; Theresa thinks she is over-dramatic; a man hears validations from his wife than no one else would know.

episodes.name: Momma's Boy
episodes.overview: Theresa's son wants to get his motorcycle license; a woman hears details from an incident in her past.

episodes.name: Spirit Left Behind
episodes.overview: Theresa does a private reading in her father's house and he feels there was a spirit left behind; Theresa reads her dad for the first time and is dumfounded.

episodes.name: Diving Right In
episodes.overview: Theresa wants to add a swimming pool to the house construction; a spirit appears like she has never seen before.

episodes.name: When There's a Will...
episodes.overview: The kids react to Theresa and Larry making a will; spirits show up in a spin class; Theresa meets with a suffering young boy.

episodes.name: Just Me and V in the Catskills
episodes.overview: Theresa and Victoria head upstate for mother-daughter bonding; they are put to the test.

episodes.name: Bunny Love
episodes.overview: Theresa's husband rescues a bunny from the wild; a woman hears from her young daughter.

episodes.name: Ready To Leave
episodes.overview: Enjoying a last supper before Victoria goes back to school; Larry Jr. wants to move out with his girlfriend; a mother hears from her son.

episodes.name: Revisited
episodes.overview: Visiting past clients affected by her messages; new messages that will help them continue to heal.

episodes.name: Unseen 2
episodes.overview: Special readings never seen before; a skeptical man hears a message from his dad; a surprise in Philadelphia leaves a woman breathless.

episodes.name: Back to Normal
episodes.overview: Larry Jr. has yet to decide if he will move out; Theresa encounters a furious woman in a reading.

episodes.name: Christmas at the Caputo's
episodes.overview: A meatball competition between Theresa and her mother-in-law.

episodes.name: On the Road: Florida
episodes.overview: Theresa heads down South to surprise unsuspecting fans with readings; a mother hears from her daughter who died tragically; a woman needs to know if her husband is still with her.

episodes.name: On the Road: Chicago
episodes.overview: Theresa and her husband see the sights of Chicago and shock people with readings.

episodes.name: On the Road: Philadelphia
episodes.overview: Theresa travels to Philadelphia to surprise people with messages from loved ones; helping a mother with her son's passing; connecting a young widow to her true love.

episodes.name: On the Road: Niagara
episodes.overview: Surprising upstate N.Y. with readings; reconnecting a grieving mother with daughter; a woman distraught after losing her husband.

episodes.name: Behind the Read
episodes.overview: Theresa's past clients and readings; how these readings changed their lives.

episodes.name: Behind the Read 2
episodes.overview: Long Island mom Teresa Caputo communicates with the dead and gives people readings.

episodes.name: Behind the Read 3
episodes.overview: Find out how past clients' experiences changed their lives.

5.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.

6.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.

episodes.name: Dog eat dog summer
episodes.overview: Larry and Theresa visit the oil company where they met; Theresa reads the woman who works there.

episodes.name: Back to My Roots
episodes.overview: Theresa goes to a genealogist to learn about her family history; a message from a spirit.

episodes.name: Don't Give Up Your Day Job
episodes.overview: After a trip to the barbershop with Larry, Theresa decides to enroll in beauty school.

episodes.name: Getting the Band Back Together
episodes.overview: Theresa's old folk group gets back together to perform; reconnecting a man with his mother.

episodes.name: On the Road: Texas
episodes.overview: Big surprises and big moments as Theresa surprises fans with readings in Texas.

episodes.name: Celebrity Spirit
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, Theresa reads for celebrities, including Jim Parsons, who connects with an old friend, and Susan Lucci, who is stunned by the messages she received. Also: Jamie-Lynn Sigler and her mother are overcome by emotion; and Katie Lowes comes to Theresa's house for a private reading.

episodes.name: Spirit in Paradise: Snowbirds
episodes.overview: The Caputos go to Florida to see if it's the right place for them in the winter. Meanwhile, Theresa tries a new hair salon and channels the brother of another customer; comforts a family dealing with the death of their son; and holds a group meeting that includes a woman whose best friend was shot and killed.

episodes.name: Spirit in Paradise: The Son Also Visits
episodes.overview: Larry Jr. visits Theresa in Florida while his father is out of town and takes his mom on a series of adventures, including riding a Jet Ski. Later, Theresa surprises a class at a dance studio with a group reading; and a man interrupts his workout on the beach so Theresa can talk to his mom on the phone.

episodes.name: Before the Wedding
episodes.overview: Bells are ringing in this special episode as Theresa conducts readings surrounding upcoming weddings. A man surprises his fiancee with a reading from Theresa, who hopes to connect with the father she is heartbroken will not walk her down the aisle.

episodes.name: Before the Baby
episodes.overview: Expectant moms get readings before they give birth, including one who connects with her father, whom she believes answered her prayers to get pregnant after a miscarriage. Later, Theresa helps a woman whose father died on Thanksgiving; and another whose younger brother passed away after a series of illnesses stemming from a tick bite.

episodes.name: Was It My Fault?
episodes.overview: In the first half of a combined season finale, people who blame themselves for the loss of loved ones are connected with the departed.

episodes.name: Healing the Anger
episodes.overview: Theresa helps people who are angry over the death of loved ones, including a man who wished his brother was dead the night before he overdosed.

episodes.name: Star Studded Spirit
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, Theresa gives readings to celebrities, including Rosie O'Donnell, Mo'Nique, Billy Gardell and Ta'Rhonda Jones.

episodes.name: I Now Pronounce You...
episodes.overview: Theresa is asked to officiate a wedding for two people who met at one of her group readings, and Larry is asked to be their best man. Before heading to Los Angeles for the ceremony, Theresa surprises a woman on Wall Street with a reading.

episodes.name: There's A Lump
episodes.overview: Fashion maven Carson Kressley gets a reading with Theresa. Theresa also channels a woman who died in a brutal murder, and does her first "automatic writing" in a decade. Nerves are frayed when Theresa's routine mammogram gives rise to some concern.

episodes.name: The Biopsy is Back
episodes.overview: Theresa does a group reading for people in law enforcement, and reunites a man with the son who was accidentally shot. Later, waiting for the results of her biopsy has Theresa so on edge that she cancels a reading for the first time in 6 years.

episodes.name: An MRI For Larry
episodes.overview: While in Los Angeles, Theresa does a reading for "Scandal" star Guillermo Diaz. Theresa also channels for a woman who believes she has the gift as well.

episodes.name: Beauty School Drop-In
episodes.overview: Theresa reads teenage triplets who suffered a tragic lost. And at a group reading, Theresa channels a man who lost many friends while serving in the military. Then, Victoria shocks the entire family when she announces she's dropping out of school.

episodes.name: Victoria's Test
episodes.overview: Theresa gives a reading to a skeptical father that lost his son. Later, a transgender woman discovers how much support she's getting from the other side. And Victoria, who recently dropped out of college for beauty school uses her family as guinea pigs.

episodes.name: Is the Gift Real?
episodes.overview: At a group reading, Theresa brings closure to a man who has been tortured by his son's death. Then, Theresa gets a brain scan while she's channeling, in the hopes doctors can tell her what goes on in her head when she's channeling spirit

episodes.name: The Spirits of Hollywood
episodes.overview: It's a star-studded season finale with "Don't Be Tardy's" Kim Zolciak-Biermann and the Buffalo Bills' Kroy Biermann, "Parks & Recreation's" Jim O'Heir "The Goldbergs" , Wendi McClendon-Covey and "Young & Hungry" star Kym Whitley all getting readings.

episodes.name: Reading the Stars
episodes.overview: It's the season premiere, and Theresa is giving emotional readings to some shocked celebrities. Television icon Kelsey Grammer, "This Is Us" breakout Chrissy Metz, "The Biggest Loser" trainer Bob Harper and Sugar Ray front man Mark McGrath.

episodes.name: Freezing Theresa
episodes.overview: "Shark Tank" shark Barbara Corcoran gets a reading with Theresa. At a fundraiser, Theresa channels an accident victim for the distraught police officer who couldn't save him. Theresa reads a man while she's inside a cryogenic freezing chamber.

episodes.name: The Breaking Point
episodes.overview: In an emotional 2-hour season premiere, Theresa goes to Fire Island and conducts one of the most powerful group readings of her life. Later, Theresa and Larry confront their issues have a devastating conversation about the future of their marriage.

episodes.name: Theresa on Tour
episodes.overview: Theresa hits the road on a cross-country tour, delivering healing messages in numerous cities; as the end of the tour nears, going home weighs heavy on her mind.

episodes.name: Living Apart
episodes.overview: Theresa experiences her first dose of life living apart from Larry as she spends time with her kids and father. Theresa gives a special gift to skeptical newlyweds channeling both of their fathers who died before their wedding.

episodes.name: Star-Crossed Spirits
episodes.overview: Theresa gives readings to Melissa Etheridge, Tituss Burgess, Robert Patrick, Jillian Michaels, Marilu Henner, Kate Walsh, and Buddy Valastro.

episodes.name: A Year of Separation
episodes.overview: Theresa adjusts as she and Larry get closer to divorce; a skeptic turns when his dad is channeled; Theresa's mother is introduced for the first time; the family thinks Larry Jr. will pop the question at a party for his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Readings and Renovations
episodes.overview: Theresa reads one of the construction workers in her home; in a group reading, she changes the mind of a skeptic who lost his son in a car accident; with Larry living in Los Angeles, Theresa makes an effort to spend time with her family.

episodes.name: An Accident on Tour
episodes.overview: Theresa is sidelined after an accident severely injures her, but that doesn't stop her from conducting readings at her doctor's office and right after surgery; now housebound, she has to open her home for group readings for the first time in years.

episodes.name: Weight-Shaming Victoria
episodes.overview: Theresa sees a doctor about ongoing health issues; Victoria is harassed online for gaining weight; she surprises a bachelorette party with a group reading; a mom seeks closure from the death of her 11-year-old daughter in a car accident.

episodes.name: The Reunion
episodes.overview: Theresa and Larry see each other for the first time in a year; a woman connects with her mom who choked to death; a woman is reunited with her fiancé who shot himself during an internet video chat with her; Theresa does a house cleansing.

episodes.name: Sitcom Spirits
episodes.overview: It is an hour of sitcom legends as Theresa gives readings to Tisha Campbell from “Martin”; Mindy Cohn from “Facts of Life”; John Ratzenberger from “Cheers”; Annie Potts from “Designing Women and Young Sheldon”; and “I Dream Of Jeannie” icon Barbara Eden.

episodes.name: Guess Who?
episodes.overview: Theresa surprises unsuspecting people at a hotel and a dentist's office; Theresa visits the kidney donor who saved her friend's life after seeing the show last year.

episodes.name: Five Star Readings
episodes.overview: Theresa gives readings to singer Debbie Gibson, John Schneider ("Dukes of Hazzard"), celebrity chef Anne Burrell, Dorit Kemsley ("Real Housewives of Beverly Hills"), and Jonathan Lipnicki ("Jerry Maguire").
